login_page.please_login: Please log in via Discord to access the OrBat.

global.title: Welcome soldier!
global.about_to_join: you are about to join the 7th Company.
global.explanation: You are going to have to go through several steps before you can be deployed on our operations. You are going to have to go above and beyond and prove that you are worthy of wearing our colors.

steps.title: Getting connected
steps.description: Step one: log in to OrBat. If you're reading this, you've made it!

steps.title: Join our Discord
steps.description: Join us on our Discord server

steps.title: Pass your initial training
steps.description: Now you must pass your initial training in order to become a soldier.

steps.title: Be deployed
steps.description: If you pass your initial training, you will have the opportunity to be deployed in our many missions. Good luck soldier!
